title: Rapha Explore Powerweave carbon gravel bike shoes may be Raphaâ€™s best shoes yet!
content:
Rapha’s new Explore Powerweave gravel bike shoes combine all of the best tech they’ve put into their own shoes, with a few new highlights for good measure. Add up the comfortable yet supportive Powerweave upper, a stiff carbon sole that is still walkable, and a new version of Boa Li2 closure with braided cords, these […]
